passives.name: Cleave
passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] deal {{as|{{rd|40% AD|20% AD}}|ad}} {{as|physical damage}} to other enemies in a {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 350 radius centered around the target.

active.name: Crescent
active.effects: Deal {{as|75% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} to enemies within a {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 450 radius in front of you.
